laureates.motivation: "for his mastery of historical and biographical description as well as for brilliant oratory in defending exalted human values"
"for proposing and supervising the plan for the economic recovery of Europe"
"for his demonstration of the phase contrast method, especially for his invention of the phase contrast microscope"
"for his discovery of the citric acid cycle"
"for his discovery of co-enzyme A and its importance for intermediary metabolism"
